message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate your enthusiasm, but $120 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying right now.  I'd be happy to buy it for $105.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $120 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'm willing to sell it to you for $115. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $115 is still a bit high for me. How about we split the difference and settle on $110?  I'm ready to close the deal at that price.

I understand that $110 is still a bit above your comfort zone, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell it to you for $112. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really love the product!
